mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contestation (typ, date_contestation, id_user, note, stop_from, stop_to, file_name,recall, date_bp) VALUES (#{typ}, #{date_contestation}, #{id_user}, #{note}, #{stop_from}, #{stop_to}, #{file_name},#{recall},#{date_bp});
mapper.select: SELECT id, typ, date_contestation, note, id_user, stop_from, stop_to, file_name, recall, date_bp FROM contestation where id_user = #{id_user} order by date_contestation desc;
mapper.update: UPDATE contestation SET typ = #{typ}, date_contestation = #{date_contestation}, id_user = #{id_user}, note = #{note}, stop_from = #{stop_from}, stop_to = #{stop_to}, file_name = #{file_name}, recall = #{recall}, date_bp = #{date_bp} WHERE id = #{id};
